Description:
Premium coastal views in the heart of the Bellarine!
At the end of a quiet cul de sac lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. From your large elevated block, capture incredible views of the bay overlooking the You Yangs and simply sit back, and watch the gentle boating traffic whilst you have your morning coffee.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.
Build your dream home in this prime coastal locale, close to some of Victorias best beaches.
Insights: 9 Waterford Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
SO AFFORDABLE (APP. 650 SQM.) BUY FOR THE FUTURE WITH 2 LIVING & 2 BATH.
An excellent buy within walking distance of the Golf club , schools , jetty, township and the Dell. Easy to live in immediately and take your time to update. Lounge room with adjacent dining, separate kitchen and meals and another living room overlooking matured garden.....both living areas are light filled and flow well. Three bedrooms , all with BIR'S, master with ensuite, , central bathroom , and laundry. Features gas heater, carport , single garage and garden shed. Easy to access for boat /caravan . Fabulous opportunity for first time homebuyer , great investment.
Insights: 13 Barongarook Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT HAVEN
This sought-after location beckons ! Stroll to the beach or wander over to the golf course for a morning round of golf ? Perfect for relaxing on the front verandah with a good novel or ponder the serenity that this quaint property affords whilst soaking up northerley views to the bay.
The galley kitchen has been fully renovated and has smart, clean lines with all new appliances. The interior has been freshened with recent paintwork, new floor coverings and holland blinds. Filtered light streams into the lounge room which is warmed on those cooler days by a gas log fire and has access to the outdoor living area. Three comfortable bedrooms and a fully renovated bathroom.
Stroll down to the Clifton Springs Golf Club for a meal or enjoy the many local cafes and restaurants the Bellarine has to offer. Regular public transport, great shopping and a ferry to Melbourne. Open this weekend.
The property has dual access and a single garage of 7.5m x 5.5m with power connected.
Insights: 7 Springs Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
ADD YOUR TOUCH, PAINT, CARPET MAKES A PERFECT STARTER.
No. 37 is close to the jetty, schools, shops and the best park on the Bellarine. So light with two living areas, formal lounge and dining with the second including kitchen, meals and generous living, both flow well with separate entrance acting as the divide. Three bedrooms, master has WIR and ensuite, other bedrooms have BIR'S. Central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Features include new garage door, new split system, Norseman wood heater, 900m upright oven with gas hot plates, double pantry and dishwasher. Double garage, double driveway with access for boat / caravan as well as big Colourbond shed (5m x 4m).
This home will suit the downsizer or the family buyer.

Description:
DOWNSIZE IN STYLE , SOLAR , LEAFY, PRIVATE GARDEN WITH DUAL ACCESS
Easy to relax, enjoy the welcome feel of No. 58 , not big, meticulously maintained with the advantage of dual access. Light and bright open plan living with direct access to the outside undercover patio. Three bedrooms all with BIR'S , central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features gas heater, air-conditioner, fans , quality window furnishings and more. Double garage as well as the second entry for boar , caravan or another vehicle. Investor, downsize or first time buy, this is the one.

Description:
Magnificent Home with Breathtaking Views
A solid brick home with panoramic views of the You Yangs and beyond will take your breath away with its stunning outlook.
New kitchen with large breakfast bar, new bright splashback, fantastic lighting, gas cooktop, dishwasher and plenty of space with a triple pantry.
Separate living area to entertain and to relax with friends and family.
Magnificent styled master bedroom with well appointed ensuite and walk in robe.
The second and third bedrooms are spacious with built in robes.
The main bathroom is well designed and fit for royalty with shower, vanity and bath.
Well appointed Laundry with plenty of storage space that leads to the backyard.
Picture perfect views from a well designed decking that has a northerly aspect.
Timber flooring throughout the home gives it that fashionable modern finish.
New air conditioning and gas ducted heating providing all year comfort.
A hidden oasis awaits you as you enter the back yard with a flowing water feature and large undercover decking with an array of plants that is an added bonus for entertaining in privacy.
This well packaged home is capped off with a new Double garage, large enough for the camper or boat and plenty of space for the home handyman.
The garage features 16 Solar panels blasting out approx. 4Kw of power.
Not too often a stylish polished home in a prime location enters the market that is the complete package.
Insights: 26 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Humble Abode with all the Trimmings
The perfect opportunity to secure your first home, investment or holiday home has presented itself in the form of this cute and quaint brick beauty! More than meets the eye, your expectations will well and truly be exceeded.
The home is situated upon a generous 566m2, corner block and offers a picture-perfect undercover verandah that runs the length of the home. You are welcomed by the immediate warmth of hardwood timber floors that run throughout the home. The master suite sits at the fore of the home and offers a spacious walk-in-robe, ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet.
The home is elevated which creates a sense of openness and airiness which is really felt from the light filled open plan living area. What makes this room so special is the feature open plan fire place, exposed brick mantel and timber beams complete with a cooling system for the warmer days.
The refurbished kitchen overlooks the living and separate dining space making entertaining a breeze also equipped with electric cooking, quality stainless steel Fisher and Paykel appliances including double dish drawer dishwasher and oven, electric stovetop ample storage complete with savvy motion sensor lights within the overhead cabinetry.
The remaining 2 bedrooms sit at the rear, with 1 offering built-in-robes and a centrally located bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and laundry complete this perfect little package.
Sliding doors from the dining area welcome you to an undercover alfresco area for easy all year round entertaining. Large double gates offer secure undercover parking with plenty of room for multiple cars, trailers, boats and caravans. A garden shed/work shop and additional undercover sitting area also sits within this private and secure outdoor space.
You'll enjoy this central location as all major amenities, schools, public transports, shops, golf club and the Bay are at your fingertips. Whether you're looking to get a foot into the market with your first home, a set and forget addition to your investment portfolio or a low maintenance holiday home, one thing is for certain, you won't forget this home!
Insights: 52 Barongarook Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 162 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Charming Home Close To The Foreshore
Prepare to fall in love with the village vibe of the Bellarine Peninsula. This ideal package sitting on approx. 616m2 located in the prime location of Clifton Springs within minutes to the foreshore and wide range of amenities, shopping and schooling.
Step inside to the front living area, opposite is through to the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. Flowing through the hallway be greeted by the second bedroom and then to the kitchen and dining area, filled with natural light and ample space with access to a lush green, private backyard. Towards the rear of the home you find the third and fourth bedrooms, laundry and main family bathroom.
Key features:
616m2 block approx.
Single garage with extra driveway space and through access
Split system
New carpet
Walk in robe and ensuite in master
Wide frontage
Quick stroll to Drysdale primary
Minutes to Drysdale Shopping Centre
Minutes to Clifton Springs foreshore
Close to Medical facilities and Clifton Springs Golf Club
Approx. 25 minutes to Geelong CBD
Potential rental return of $390-$420 approx. per week
The perfect entrance, upgrade or investment.
For more information please contact Julia on 0432 182 271.
Insights: 162 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stellar Starter or Ideal Investment
Located in an extremely sought-after pocket of Clifton Springs, approximately 3 minutes from the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp stands this well-appointed abode. With a partial update, 644m2 allotment and Bay views this home has ideal foundations for those who seek location and structure but want to further improve; you can move straight in or add it to the portfolio either way this home has a lot going for it in the way of added value and potential.
A smart design has a single level home with enough elevation to make the most of the sublime views on offer. The quirky split-level floor plan ensures enough room for all family members but offers versatility allowing you to fulfil the areas in a multitude of ways. Due to the aspect of the home and the character windows, this home is light-filled and airy throughout.
Comprising 4 bedrooms 3 with built-in robes the master with a tiled walk-in robe and updated ensuite. The first level hosts 2 bedrooms (including the master suite) and a living area, reading room or study depending on how you would like to zone the home. Step down onto the lower level where you will find the remaining 2 bedrooms and 2nd living area before flowing into the updated kitchen and dining. The zoned galley style kitchen also has an open plan element to it via the convenient breakfast bench. A combination of timber benchtops, dishwasher and ample storage space; enjoy breakfast looking out onto the landscaped gardens.
The main bathroom can be accessed via the oversized laundry which has also had a partial update. The rear of the home is complete with a 3rd living area that has sliding door access into the back garden.
Both front/back gardens are low maintenance (no grass to mow), the back garden has a sense of zen' with the scope to add your own creative touches.
Features of the home include ducted heating, 2x split systems (heating/cooling), ceiling fan and wood heater, garden shed plus additional storage facilities, carport with a two-way driveway.
This home has had enough done to it for you to move straight into or lease out however the exciting part is that its utterly different, fantastic bones that offers a wealth of opportunity for the savvy buyer with a vision. The home can be changed but location is forever!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 103 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Time to build your dream home.
Panoramic views of the bay and beyond, here's the opportunity to build and design a home to take a advantage of the view. Ideal location for a two storey home of the design, facade & materials you want to use.
Located within minutes of the Drysdale shopping precinct, local schools and within walking distance to the beach, the golf club and the Clifton Springs Boat Harbour. The block is undulated enabling you to build your dream home with commanding views of Geelong and across Corio Bay. Block size 586 sqm.

Description:
Creative Vision for Coastal Vista
With a little spruce this three-bedroom and two bathroom abode could become your dream coastal home or a secure investment with either permanent or holiday rental options. Add a second storey and youve got yourself priceless views across the bay (STCA). The choice is yours!
Enter via a paved driveway to a full length side deck that has an outlook over the Clifton Springs Golf Club, youll either be on the course regularly or watching. Stunning cathedral ceilings with exposed rafters greet you as you enter the premises and create a vastness of space and on everyones wishlist - a sunken lounge room!
Flowing onto a good-size dining area, three-seater breakfast bar and kitchen with stainless steel appliances, five-burner stove top and built-in pantry. Step through sliding doors to a large outdoor barbeque and entertaining zone and garden with established native trees.
Back inside is the master bedroom, WIR and en suite situated near the entrance, then along the hallway is a laundry, linen press, main bathroom with a sauna, two double bedrooms and one with an additional space that could be either a study or TV room. A double LUG with through access and workshop provides extra storage.
Five minutes away is the highly visited destination on the Bellarine, Jack Rabbit Vineyard. An enviable location with water only 200 metres away ready for you to launch the boat every weekend and close to schools, shops, sporting facilities and the highway into Geelong.
Insights: 8 Springs Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand new opportunity in Central Rise.
Situated in the Central Rise Estate, 81 Central Road is the ultimate brand new home that a growing family will enjoy or the astute investor will see the perfect opportunity to add a solid investment to their portfolio. This home boasts 3 large bedrooms, 2 with large BIR, the master bedroom with WIR, with all bedrooms featuring large windows throughout. The savvy buyer will appreciate all the quality features the home has to offer with stainless steel quality appliances that complement the spacious kitchen's design for entertaining. Internal access from the garage allows ease to get the groceries inside and there is side access to the backyard. The backyard is a blank canvas, perfect to be able to create your piece of serenity. 81 Central Road has everything any growing family could want especially when you have all the shopping precincts, local schools, public transport, a 20 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and the lifestyle appeal the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Also perfect for those investment buyers looking for a high end return on a premium investment. An inspection is a must for you to fully appreciate what this home really has on offer.
Insights: 81 Central Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
What a Gem
A wonderful opportunity presents to secure a blue chip entry level property right within the waterfront precinct only a short stroll to the shoreline! This charming 3 bedroom residence is beautifully appointed with a generous primary living zone, offers a lovely northerly orientation and is bathed in natural light.
3 bedrooms; master is well proportioned and is complete with walk in robe and ceiling fan. The 2 additional bedrooms have built in robes
The kitchen serves up a great usable space; expansive benchtops, excellent storage solutions, stainless steel appliances and a 900mm gas cooktop.
The primary living zone is oversized and boasts a stunning corner set window that promotes wonderful natural light
Quality carpets, crisp white finishes and immaculate presentation ensure this property is a genuine turnkey and start enjoying from day one
A carport and additional off street parking further endorse this property's user friendly nature
An important additional feature of this little gem is a fully powered shed; this extends the living zones and could easily be used as a rumpus or teenager retreat.
The A+ location places you right in the waterfront precinct to embrace an enviable Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle. With a glimpse of the water from your tippy toes suggesting that great views can be had from a 2nd storey extension (STCA)
This property represents a terrific step into the property market. A great home for today and a wonderful investment for the future.
Insights: 33 Kanyanya Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming & Affordable
Relaxed vibes & homely feels as soon as you step in the front door! Lounge has tiled entry, carpet, ceiling fan & wood heater! Flowing onto a modern kitchen with stainless steel oven & range hood with a great dining area, RC SS & sliding doors out to the deck. Central two-way stylish bathroom has deep luxurious bath & large shower has dual shower heads. 3 bedrooms & 2 have built in robes. Undercover L shaped merbau deck has 3-sided roller cafe blinds with some bay views. Deck continues down to an open alfresco area with dual sided steps to the landscaped tropical themed yard & concreted garden shed. Additional storage under the deck. All sitting pretty on a 585m2 block with a single carport & off-street parking for 3 cars plus a boat. In a quiet neighbourhood, just 200 meters to the milk bar & fish'n'chips shop, close to boat ramp, golf club, tennis courts, parks, local schools, public transport, medical facilities and new shopping centre.
Insights: 20 Mirrabooka Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME WITH VIEWS
This property presents great value for the prospective purchaser and the vendors are ready to negotiate a sale ! Take in the breathtaking views from the spacious living area and master suite of this immaculately presented home. Positioned to view the night lights of Geelong the home has a spacious feel with cathedral ceilings in the living areas complimented by modern fixtures and fittings.
The master suite comprises large walk in robe, additional storage room or second robe and spacious full ensuite.
Natural light from the northerly aspect saturates the kitchen, deck and family-dining areas. Great work areas with plenty of cupboard space and modern SS appliances. The expansive, outdoor entertaining deck has views to the bay whilst retaining the privacy of the rear yard. Minor bedrooms are located at the rear of the home - both with substantial storage. Access to the rear garden through a delightful courtyard from the third bedroom. Central family bathroom with spa and the largest laundry in the neighbourhood complete this extremely attractive property.
Features include etched glass doors, lime-washed timber, central fernery, workshop area plus triple garages, 5KW solar inverter, OFP and more
Insights: 7 Gumarooka Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Secluded Tropical Courtyard
Positioned in established Clifton Springs within walking distance to the water, local shopping strip and public transport. A short drive to the local boat ramp and only a few minutes to the Drysdale shopping centre. This property is perfect for the retired person with the occasional visitor or a couple looking for their first home. Central to all the Bellarine has to offer.
The beautiful garden aspects from the interior of the home give 15 Derribong Way a serene, country appeal. The lovely master suite has access to a private courtyard. A spacious open plan living area lends itself to multiple layout choices with the minor bedrooms and family bathroom to the rear of the home. From the immaculate kitchen you can access the double garage.
This property has those little extras too numerous to mention but include solar panels, rain water tank, side access for a trailer or tinny, quality windows, floor to ceiling robes, WILP, fans and much more. A great home with all the trimmings, well maintained and presented throughout.
Insights: 15 Derribong Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Hidden Treasure
A cut above and class apart, this stunning residence is a statement of style, centrally located and situated in a quiet street, hidden behind a high fence. Fresh and bright, upon entering, you are greeted with a practical floorplan boasting timber floors, contrasting against the crisp white walls. This amazingly private and peaceful residence features 3 bedrooms all with B.I.R, 2 bathrooms (a combined large bathroom and laundry). Relax in the open lounge/dining room with a bay window seat, a new split system and an inbuilt wood fireplace for easy living and casual entertaining and a separate sun room. Contemporary and functional open plan kitchen/meals area is equipped with quality appliances which includes a 900mm Dâamani freestanding oven and solid timber red gum bench tops.
Outside you will find, a work shop/garage (3 phase power), undercover patio, outdoor studio, vegetable garden beds, underground sprinkler system, whilst an outdoor shower awaits you upon your return from the beach or fishing. This amazing spacious outdoors area, on an allotment of 1193m2 (approx.), is surrounded by trees, a low maintenance established native garden which offers ample space for childrenâs play equipment, a fire pit area that is situated in the top right hand corner of the block to make the most of the view and plenty of room for the family to relax and enjoy the bay views. In the immediate vicinity you will find Clifton Springs Foreshore is a stunning coastal reserve with exquisite scenery and beaches. Easy access to the Clifton Springs golf course, and the iconic Dell is just moments away. The reserve boasts tremendous views, as well as a plethora of rotundas and walking tracks.
Astute purchasers will immediately recognize the scarcity of opportunities such as this as well as the chance to realize the dream of a lifetime. This is a must-see property for anyone considering a coastal residence to enter the Clifton Springs market.
Insights: 14-16 Almerta Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Fab Five Beds with Fantastic Views
Rarely do we come across not only a quality home of 5 bedrooms, but also 2 large living areas, great outdoor entertaining space and VIEWS! Having started out life as the typical 3 beder, the owners extended this home adding a huge living area and 2 more bedrooms to accommodate their growing family. Importantly there is also the full ensuite and all this is warmed by 2 wood heaters meaning cosy winters overlooking the water watching the clouds roll in. Excellent location only a few minutes' walk to the bay, reserves, shops and school the added bonus is a side drive ideal for the caravan or boat. Grow into this home or set your family up without needing to move again. Bargain buying for this amount of accommodation!

Description:
Get a start in life
Charming and neat as a pin, you will love the feel of this three bedroom home on a generous allotment of approx 592sqm.
The lounge room with split system air conditioner & easy sliding door access out to the private covered entertainment area.
The kitchen with plenty of bench space, walk in pantry & plenty of cupboard space.
Three spacious carpeted bedrooms all with build in robes compliment this superb home.
A very clean laundry with abundance of storage space leads out to the back yard that is tiered and ready to put your stamp on it.
A single carport leads out to a covered entertaining area to where you can relax and unwind.
Perfect for first home owners or for the astute investor and great for retirees with its low maintenance garden.
Minutes from shops and amenities and of course the sporting precinct consisting of the Clifton Springs Golf club and outdoor bowls club. Enjoy the Bay with its fantastic fishing and boating areas.
Do not miss this opportunity to live and play on the Bellarine with this well priced home.
Insights: 74 Bunganowee Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
